A smart toothbrush with built-in AI that analyzes your brushing technique and provides real-time feedback to help you brush more effectively and efficiently. It can also track your brushing habits and provide personalized recommendations to improve your oral hygiene.

A toothbrush with a built-in tongue scraper that helps remove bacteria and debris from the surface of your tongue, improving bad breath and overall oral health. The tongue scraper can be retractable for easy cleaning and maintenance.

A toothbrush that uses sonic technology to provide a more thorough cleaning of your teeth. The toothbrush head vibrates at high speeds to loosen and remove plaque and food particles, leaving your teeth feeling clean and refreshed.

A toothbrush that utilizes airflow technology to clean your teeth. The toothbrush head contains small air holes that blow air onto your teeth, removing plaque and debris more effectively than traditional toothbrushes.

A toothbrush that incorporates aromatherapy into its design. The toothbrush head contains small pods that release a pleasant scent as you brush your teeth, providing a more enjoyable and relaxing oral hygiene experience.
